meanings.definition: Not supervised or accompanied by a chaperone.
meanings.sent1: The children went on an unchaperoned field trip.
meanings.sent2: She felt unchaperoned while exploring the empty house.
meanings.sent3: The unchaperoned puppy caused chaos in the park.
meanings.sent4: The unchaperoned garden grew wild and free.
meanings.sent5: The unchaperoned boat drifted aimlessly in the lake.

meanings.sent1: The teenagers wandered unchaperoned through the museum.
meanings.sent2: She decided to walk unchaperoned to the store.
meanings.sent3: The cat strolled unchaperoned around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew unchaperoned through the open window.
meanings.sent5: The rain fell unchaperoned on the deserted street.
